attributes.action: Stop the roadworks at Junction 13 on the M65
attributes.background: New road works have been started to add traffic lights to the roundabout at J13 on the M65, these are not needed.   This roundabout works perfectly for 23 hours a day and is busy during 'rush hour'.  Adding traffic lights will add to the waiting time for the whole day, which is not needed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  While junctions 1-10 of the M65 are managed by the Highways Agency, junctions 10-14 are managed by Lancashire County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

Lancashire also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: 

http://council.lancashire.gov.uk/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx?bcr=1
